label: Pinterest
name: pinterest
description: Interact with Pinterest API (v5) endpoints, including user accounts, boards, pins, ads, catalogs, analytics, and more.

options.label: Get User Account
options.name: getUserAccount
options.description: Get account profile information for the authorized user.

options.label: Get User Account Analytics
options.name: getUserAccountAnalytics
options.description: Get analytics for the authorized user's account (audience metrics, profile impressions, etc).

options.label: Get User Account Top Pins Analytics
options.name: getUserTopPinsAnalytics
options.description: Get analytics data for the user's top Pins (top 50 Pins).

options.label: Get User Account Top Video Pins Analytics
options.name: getUserTopVideoPinsAnalytics
options.description: Get analytics data for the user's top video Pins (top 50 Pins).

options.label: List Linked Business Accounts
options.name: listLinkedBusinesses
options.description: List business accounts linked to the authorized user.

options.label: List Followers
options.name: listFollowers
options.description: List the users following the authorized user.

options.label: List Following Users
options.name: listFollowingUsers
options.description: List the users that the authorized user is following.

options.label: List Following Boards
options.name: listFollowingBoards
options.description: List the boards that the authorized user is following.

options.label: Follow User
options.name: followUser
options.description: Follow another user by username (Beta feature).

options.label: Verify Website
options.name: verifyWebsite
options.description: Verify a website for the authorized user.

options.label: Get Website Verification Status
options.name: getWebsiteVerification
options.description: Get the status of website verification for the authorized user.

options.label: List Boards
options.name: listBoards
options.description: Get a list of boards owned by the user (and group boards the user is a collaborator on).

options.label: Create Board
options.name: createBoard
options.description: Create a new board for the user.

options.label: Get Board
options.name: getBoard
options.description: Get details of a specific board.

options.label: Update Board
options.name: updateBoard
options.description: Update a board's information (name, description, privacy).

options.label: Delete Board
options.name: deleteBoard
options.description: Delete a board.

options.label: List Board Sections
options.name: listBoardSections
options.description: List all sections on a specified board.

options.label: Create Board Section
options.name: createBoardSection
options.description: Create a new section within a board.

options.label: Update Board Section
options.name: updateBoardSection
options.description: Update a board section's name.

options.label: Delete Board Section
options.name: deleteBoardSection
options.description: Delete a section from a board.

options.label: List Pins on Board
options.name: listBoardPins
options.description: List all Pins on a specific board.

options.label: List Pins on Board Section
options.name: listBoardSectionPins
options.description: List all Pins in a specific board section.

options.label: List Pins
options.name: listPins
options.description: List all Pins owned by the user.

options.label: Create Pin
options.name: createPin
options.description: Create a new Pin on a board (or board section).

options.label: Get Pin
options.name: getPin
options.description: Get details of a specific Pin.

options.label: Update Pin
options.name: updatePin
options.description: Update a Pin's details (title, description, link).

options.label: Delete Pin
options.name: deletePin
options.description: Delete a Pin.

options.label: Search Boards
options.name: searchBoards
options.description: Search the user's boards by a query.

options.label: Search Pins
options.name: searchPins
options.description: Search the user's Pins by a query.

options.label: Search Partner Pins
options.name: searchPartnerPins
options.description: Search for top Pins by a given search term (Beta).

options.label: List Ad Accounts
options.name: listAdAccounts
options.description: List ad accounts the user has access to.

options.label: Create Ad Account
options.name: createAdAccount
options.description: Create a new ad account for the user.

options.label: Get Ad Account
options.name: getAdAccount
options.description: Get details of a specific ad account.

options.label: List Campaigns
options.name: listCampaigns
options.description: List campaigns in an ad account.

options.label: Create Campaign
options.name: createCampaign
options.description: Create a new campaign in an ad account.

options.label: Get Campaign
options.name: getCampaign
options.description: Get details of a specific campaign.

options.label: Update Campaign
options.name: updateCampaign
options.description: Update one or more existing campaigns (e.g. status or budget).

options.label: List Ad Groups
options.name: listAdGroups
options.description: List ad groups in an ad account (optionally filtered by campaign).

options.label: Create Ad Group
options.name: createAdGroup
options.description: Create a new ad group under a campaign.

options.label: Get Ad Group
options.name: getAdGroup
options.description: Get details of a specific ad group.

options.label: Update Ad Group
options.name: updateAdGroup
options.description: Update one or more existing ad groups (e.g. status or targeting).

options.label: List Ads
options.name: listAds
options.description: List ads in an ad account (optionally filtered by campaign or ad group).

options.label: Create Ad
options.name: createAd
options.description: Create a new ad (Pin promotion) in an ad group.

options.label: Update Ad
options.name: updateAd
options.description: Update one or more existing ads (e.g. status).

options.label: Create Ad Preview
options.name: createAdPreview
options.description: Generate a preview of a promoted Pin (ad) using a Pin or image.

options.label: Create Keywords
options.name: createKeywords
options.description: Create keywords for targeting (attach keywords to an ad group or campaign).

options.label: Update Keywords
options.name: updateKeywords
options.description: Update keywords (e.g. bids or archive status).

options.label: Get Keyword Metrics
options.name: getKeywordMetrics
options.description: Get keyword metrics aggregated (e.g. search counts by country).

options.label: List Audiences
options.name: listAudiences
options.description: List audiences available in an ad account.

options.label: Create Custom Audience
options.name: createCustomAudience
options.description: Create a new custom audience (for targeting).

options.label: Get Audience
options.name: getAudience
options.description: Get details of a specific audience.

options.label: List Customer Lists
options.name: listCustomerLists
options.description: List customer (user) lists in an ad account.

options.label: Create Customer List
options.name: createCustomerList
options.description: Create a new customer list audience (e.g. email list).

options.label: Get Customer List
options.name: getCustomerList
options.description: Get details of a specific customer list.

options.label: Update Customer List
options.name: updateCustomerList
options.description: Append or remove records in an existing customer list.

options.label: List Conversion Tags
options.name: listConversionTags
options.description: List conversion tags associated with an ad account.

options.label: Get Conversion Tag
options.name: getConversionTag
options.description: Get details of a specific conversion tag.

options.label: Create Conversion Tag
options.name: createConversionTag
options.description: Create a new Pinterest conversion tag.

options.label: Update Conversion Tag
options.name: updateConversionTag
options.description: Update an existing conversion tag (e.g. rename or settings).

options.label: Send Conversion Events
options.name: sendConversionEvents
options.description: Send conversion event data (via the Conversions API).

options.label: List Media Uploads
options.name: listMediaUploads
options.description: List media upload requests (media assets) for the user or ad account.

options.label: Create Media Upload
options.name: createMediaUpload
options.description: Initiate a new media upload (for images or videos).

options.label: Get Media Upload
options.name: getMediaUpload
options.description: Check the status of a media upload by ID.

options.label: List Catalogs
options.name: listCatalogs
options.description: List catalogs associated with the user or business.

options.label: List Catalog Feeds
options.name: listCatalogFeeds
options.description: List product feed sources (data feeds) for catalogs.

options.label: Create Catalog Feed
options.name: createCatalogFeed
options.description: Create a new product feed for a catalog (register a data source).

options.label: Get Catalog Feed
options.name: getCatalogFeed
options.description: Get details of a specific product feed.

options.label: Update Catalog Feed
options.name: updateCatalogFeed
options.description: Update settings of a product feed (e.g. name or status).

options.label: Delete Catalog Feed
options.name: deleteCatalogFeed
options.description: Delete a product feed.

options.label: List Feed Processing Results
options.name: listFeedProcessingResults
options.description: List processing results (errors, warnings) for a given feed.

options.label: List Catalog Items
options.name: listCatalogItems
options.description: List products (catalog items) from the user's catalog.

options.label: Operate on Catalog Item Batch
options.name: operateCatalogItemBatch
options.description: Apply operations (create/update/remove) on a set of catalog items.

options.label: Get Catalog Item Batch Status
options.name: getCatalogItemBatch
options.description: Get the status/results of a catalog items batch operation.

options.label: List Product Groups
options.name: listProductGroups
options.description: List product groups (collections of items) in the catalog.

options.label: Create Product Group
options.name: createProductGroup
options.description: Create a new product group (item filter set) in the catalog.

options.label: Get Product Group
options.name: getProductGroup
options.description: Get details of a specific product group.

options.label: Get Product Group Product Counts
options.name: getProductGroupProductCounts
options.description: Get the count of products in a specific product group.

options.label: List Products in Product Group
options.name: getProductGroupProducts
options.description: List the product items belonging to a specific product group.

options.label: List Product Group Promotions
options.name: listProductGroupPromotions
options.description: List promoted product groups (shopping ads) in an ad account.

options.label: Create Product Group Promotion
options.name: createProductGroupPromotion
options.description: Promote a product group (create a new product group promotion).

options.label: Get Product Group Promotion
options.name: getProductGroupPromotion
options.description: Get details of a specific product group promotion.

options.label: Update Product Group Promotion
options.name: updateProductGroupPromotion
options.description: Update an existing product group promotion (e.g. status or bid).

options.label: Get Campaign Analytics
options.name: getCampaignAnalytics
options.description: Retrieve analytics metrics for one or more campaigns in an ad account.

options.label: Get Ad Group Analytics
options.name: getAdGroupAnalytics
options.description: Retrieve analytics metrics for one or more ad groups in an ad account.

options.label: Get Ad Analytics
options.name: getAdAnalytics
options.description: Retrieve analytics metrics for one or more ads in an ad account.

options.label: Get Product Group Analytics
options.name: getProductGroupAnalytics
options.description: Retrieve analytics metrics for one or more product group promotions.

options.label: Get Campaign Targeting Analytics
options.name: getCampaignTargetingAnalytics
options.description: Retrieve targeting breakdown analytics for one or more campaigns.

options.label: Get Ad Group Targeting Analytics
options.name: getAdGroupTargetingAnalytics
options.description: Retrieve targeting breakdown analytics for one or more ad groups.

options.label: Get Audience Insights
options.name: getAudienceInsights
options.description: Get audience insights for an ad account (overview of audience metrics).

options.label: Create Analytics Report
options.name: createAnalyticsReport
options.description: Create an asynchronous analytics report for an ad account (returns a report token).

options.label: Get Analytics Report
options.name: getAnalyticsReport
options.description: Retrieve a previously requested analytics report (using a report token).

options.label: List Related Terms
options.name: listRelatedTerms
options.description: Get a list of search terms related to a given term (for targeting suggestions).

options.label: List Suggested Terms
options.name: listSuggestedTerms
options.description: Get a list of suggested search terms often used together with a given term.

options.label: Get Advertising Terms of Service
options.name: getTermsOfService
options.description: Get the Pinterest Advertising Terms of Service.

inputParameters.label: Username to Follow
inputParameters.name: usernameToFollow
inputParameters.description: The username of the Pinterest user to follow.

inputParameters.label: Website URL
inputParameters.name: websiteUrl
inputParameters.description: The website URL to verify (including http:// or https://).

inputParameters.label: Board ID
inputParameters.name: boardId
inputParameters.description: The ID of the board.

inputParameters.label: Board Name
inputParameters.name: boardName
inputParameters.description: Name of the board.

inputParameters.label: Board Description
inputParameters.name: boardDescription
inputParameters.description: Description of the board.

inputParameters.label: Board Privacy
inputParameters.name: boardPrivacy
inputParameters.description: Privacy setting for the board.

inputParameters.label: Board Section ID
inputParameters.name: sectionId
inputParameters.description: The ID of the board section.

inputParameters.label: Board Section Name
inputParameters.name: sectionName
inputParameters.description: Name of the board section.

inputParameters.label: Pin ID
inputParameters.name: pinId
inputParameters.description: The ID of the Pin.

inputParameters.label: Pin Title
inputParameters.name: pinTitle
inputParameters.description: Title of the Pin.

inputParameters.label: Pin Description
inputParameters.name: pinDescription
inputParameters.description: Description for the Pin.

inputParameters.label: Pin Link
inputParameters.name: pinLink
inputParameters.description: Destination URL for the Pin (optional).

inputParameters.label: Image URL
inputParameters.name: imageUrl
inputParameters.description: Direct URL of an image to use for the Pin (required if no media ID is provided).

inputParameters.label: Media Upload ID
inputParameters.name: mediaId
inputParameters.description: The ID of the media upload.

inputParameters.label: Ad Account ID
inputParameters.name: adAccountId
inputParameters.description: The ID of the ad account.

inputParameters.label: Campaign ID
inputParameters.name: campaignId
inputParameters.description: The ID of the campaign.

inputParameters.label: Campaign Name
inputParameters.name: campaignName
inputParameters.description: Name of the campaign.

inputParameters.label: Campaign Status
inputParameters.name: campaignStatus
inputParameters.description: Status of the campaign.

inputParameters.label: Campaign Objective
inputParameters.name: campaignObjective
inputParameters.description: Advertising objective for the campaign.

inputParameters.label: Daily Budget
inputParameters.name: dailyBudget
inputParameters.description: Daily budget for the campaign (in micro currency, e.g., 1000000 for $1.00).

inputParameters.label: Lifetime Budget
inputParameters.name: lifetimeBudget
inputParameters.description: Lifetime budget for the campaign (in micro currency).

inputParameters.label: Ad Group ID
inputParameters.name: adGroupId
inputParameters.description: The ID of the ad group.

inputParameters.label: Ad Group Name
inputParameters.name: adGroupName
inputParameters.description: Name of the ad group.

inputParameters.label: Ad Group Status
inputParameters.name: adGroupStatus
inputParameters.description: Status of the ad group.

inputParameters.label: Start Time
inputParameters.name: startTime
inputParameters.description: Ad group start time (Unix timestamp in seconds).

inputParameters.label: End Time
inputParameters.name: endTime
inputParameters.description: Ad group end time (Unix timestamp in seconds).

inputParameters.label: Ad Name
inputParameters.name: adName
inputParameters.description: Name of the ad (optional label for internal use).

inputParameters.label: Ad Status
inputParameters.name: adStatus
inputParameters.description: Status of the ad.

inputParameters.label: Keyword ID
inputParameters.name: keywordId
inputParameters.description: The ID of the keyword.

inputParameters.label: Keyword Text
inputParameters.name: keywordText
inputParameters.description: The keyword text to add (for multiple keywords, separate by commas).

inputParameters.label: Match Type
inputParameters.name: matchType
inputParameters.description: Keyword match type.

inputParameters.label: Keyword Bid
inputParameters.name: keywordBid
inputParameters.description: Max CPC bid for the keyword (in micro currency).

inputParameters.label: Archived
inputParameters.name: archived
inputParameters.description: Whether to archive (remove) the keyword.

inputParameters.label: Audience ID
inputParameters.name: audienceId
inputParameters.description: The ID of the audience.

inputParameters.label: Audience Name
inputParameters.name: audienceName
inputParameters.description: Name of the new audience.

inputParameters.label: Audience Rule
inputParameters.name: audienceRule
inputParameters.description: Definition of the audience (rule or criteria in JSON).

inputParameters.label: Customer List ID
inputParameters.name: customerListId
inputParameters.description: The ID of the customer list (audience).

inputParameters.label: Customer List Name
inputParameters.name: customerListName
inputParameters.description: Name of the customer list (audience).

inputParameters.label: Customer List Type
inputParameters.name: listType
inputParameters.description: Type of identifiers in the customer list.

inputParameters.label: Records to Add
inputParameters.name: recordsToAdd
inputParameters.description: New records to add to the customer list (comma or newline separated, hashed as required).

inputParameters.label: Records to Remove
inputParameters.name: recordsToRemove
inputParameters.description: Records to remove from the customer list (comma or newline separated, hashed as required).

inputParameters.label: Conversion Tag ID
inputParameters.name: conversionTagId
inputParameters.description: The ID of the conversion tag (Pinterest Tag).

inputParameters.label: Conversion Tag Name
inputParameters.name: conversionTagName
inputParameters.description: Name of the conversion tag.

inputParameters.label: Conversion Event Data
inputParameters.name: conversionData
inputParameters.description: Conversion event payload data (JSON object).

inputParameters.label: Media Content URL
inputParameters.name: mediaUrl
inputParameters.description: Public URL of the media file to upload (image or video).

inputParameters.label: Media Type
inputParameters.name: mediaType
inputParameters.description: Type of media being uploaded.

inputParameters.label: Lead Form ID
inputParameters.name: leadFormId
inputParameters.description: The ID of the lead form.

inputParameters.label: Lead Form Data
inputParameters.name: leadFormData
inputParameters.description: Lead form configuration data (JSON) for creating or updating a form (questions, etc).

inputParameters.label: Lead Form Test Data
inputParameters.name: leadFormTestData
inputParameters.description: Answers data to generate test leads for the form (JSON).

inputParameters.label: Subscription ID
inputParameters.name: subscriptionId
inputParameters.description: The ID of the lead ads subscription.

inputParameters.label: Subscription Callback URL
inputParameters.name: subscriptionUrl
inputParameters.description: The endpoint URL to receive lead data (webhook) for the subscription.

inputParameters.label: Search Query
inputParameters.name: query
inputParameters.description: Search query text.

inputParameters.label: Term
inputParameters.name: term
inputParameters.description: Search term to find related or suggested terms for.

inputParameters.label: Start Date
inputParameters.name: startDate
inputParameters.description: Start date for analytics data (YYYY-MM-DD).

inputParameters.label: End Date
inputParameters.name: endDate
inputParameters.description: End date for analytics data (YYYY-MM-DD).

inputParameters.label: Metrics
inputParameters.name: metrics
inputParameters.description: Comma-separated list of metrics to retrieve (e.g. IMPRESSIONS, CLICKS, etc).

inputParameters.label: Granularity
inputParameters.name: granularity
inputParameters.description: Time granularity for analytics (data aggregation).

inputParameters.label: Report Token
inputParameters.name: reportToken
inputParameters.description: Token of the analytics report to retrieve (from a previous create report call).

inputParameters.label: Page Size
inputParameters.name: pageSize
inputParameters.description: Number of items per page (for paginated results).

inputParameters.label: Page Bookmark
inputParameters.name: bookmark
inputParameters.description: Cursor for pagination (for fetching the next page of results).
